quotes.quote: Stretching your body and mind is essential to avoid rigidity.
A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
The passion for stretching yourself and sticking to it, even (or especially) when it's not going well, is the hallmark of the growth mindset.
By stretching yourself beyond your perceived level of confidence you accelerate your development of competence.
Stretching his hand up to reach the stars, too often man forgets the flowers at his feet.
It is not about proving anything to the world. It is all about proving your capabilities to yourself and stretching your own boundaries.
When you stretch your mind, you stretch the world around you.
If there isn't a struggle, there's no stretch, and therefore no growth. Easy doesn’t change you and comfort won’t challenge you. Coasting isn't a strategy.
You have to stretch your soul to find your potential strength.
Dare to stretch hard and make it a point to do the hard thing others are afraid to try.
Anyone that does not wish or desire to stretch himself will get nowhere in this life. That is just the way life is.
The human spirit is like an elastic band. The more you stretch, the greater your capacity.
Practice makes comfort. Expand your experiences regularly so every stretch won’t feel like your first.
It's when you stretch the truth that you end up with lies.
Life demands for us to stretch ourselves.
Stretch your mind and you will reach beyond your current reality.
It is by stretching our limits that we move beyond boundaries. Keep improving!
